# This file is autogenerated
title: sendSmsOtp
description: Overview of the sendSmsOtp method
slug: wallets/reference/alchemy/signer/classes/AuthClient/sendSmsOtp
---

Sends an OTP (One-Time Password) to the specified phone number via SMS.
The OTP will be sent to the user's phone and can be submitted using submitOtpCode().

Phone number must include country code (e.g., "+15551234567").

## Import

```ts
import { AuthClient } from "@alchemy/auth";
```

## Usage

```ts twoslash
await authClient.sendSmsOtp({ phoneNumber: "+15551234567" });
// User will receive an OTP code via SMS
```

## Parameters

### params

`SendSmsOtpParams`

- Parameters for sending the SMS OTP

### params.phoneNumber

`string`

- Phone number with country code to send the OTP to

### params.sessionExpirationMs

`number`

- Session expiration in milliseconds

## Returns

`Promise<void>`
Promise that resolves when the OTP has been sent
